name: Marina Bay Sands
description: Iconic luxury resort featuring infinity pool, casino, shopping, and stunning city views in Singapore's Marina Bay district.

name: Raffles Hotel Singapore
description: Historic colonial-style luxury hotel, famous for inventing the Singapore Sling cocktail and impeccable service.

name: The Fullerton Hotel Singapore
description: Heritage luxury hotel housed in a beautifully restored 1928 neoclassical building overlooking Marina Bay.

name: The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore
description: Luxurious hotel featuring contemporary art collection, Michelin-starred dining, and panoramic city or harbor views.

name: Budget Inn Singapore
description: Affordable accommodation with basic amenities, perfect for budget-conscious travelers exploring Singapore.
